title: The Order of the Silver Lance

text.text:
By the Order of the Silver Lance and under 
the supervision of I Urist Ironhammer, 
use this text to bestow knowledge of the order 
and its long history.

Since the order founded in 1710, followers of 
Silver Lance have marveled over his superior 
craftsmanship. Of which many have tried to 
mimic which included I Urist Ironhammer 
The Ledendary Dwarven Craftsman.

Within the following pages are secrets long 
kept by the order, caution and discretion are 
advised to avoid revalation or personal harm.
